title: Use ivy for dependency resolving
description:
First cut on ivy support.

Removed all libs in lib/ but not yet for the web app.

Patch includes basic ivy rep (tar) for all jars that are ATM not in ivy nor in maven.

comments.author: Thorsten Scherler
comments.content:
After applying the patch do:

ant ivy.resolve

If we want to keep the ivy support we should add a dependency to the compile target.
